# VisualShaderNodeScreenNormalWorldSpace

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A visual shader node that unpacks the screen normal texture in World Space.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The ScreenNormalWorldSpace node allows to create outline effects.
